name: Cold War Flight Simulator
description:
A game from the creators of 737 Flight Simulator.

Enjoy cold war planes with this wonderful unique fully featured flight simulator.

We give you a fantastic opportunity to see what real pilots encounter in critical situations. There are 7 different regions to explore each having different real life scenarios.

Features:
- realistic plane crash simulations
- real life missions
- real indicators
- time and weather conditions
- tutorial missions
- new FREE missions with each update
- mission builder
- access to houndreds of shared missions
- 3D and side view cameras
- great music
- Apple Watch support!
- and much more...

We would like to hear your opinion, please rate and send your feedback to flyingdreamscompany@gmail.com

And one more thing: WE ARE PASSIONATE ABOUT FLYING AND WE LOVE THIS GAME!

Facebook support page: https://www.facebook.com/Cold-War-Flight-Simulator-1701534893448286/

We dedicate this game to all who lost their lives or suffered injuries in airplane crashes.
